repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Harper's Illustrated Pictorial History of the Civil War

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in one series.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This book was found in the Ryder Collection of Confederate Archives in 2011; the Ryder collection was cataloged as part of the WPA in 1939/1940 but in later decades the catalog ( A Calendar of the Ryder Collection of the Confederate Archives at Tufts College 1940) was forgotten and library staff added other materials to the Ryder collection, usually items from the South, from the 18th and 19th century and around the time of the Civil War.
Because the book was published after Ryder's death and was not part of the original Ryder collection, item was removed and a separate, 'artificial' collection was created.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one Harper's Pictorial History of the Civil War. This monograph was published in 1894 by Star Publishing Company (Chicago, Illinois) and is an illustrated monograph of the history of the American Civil War (1861-1865).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

did.unittitle: Harper's Illustrated Pictorial History of the Civil War

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of Harper's Illustrated Pictorial History of the Civil War. Originally published in 1866, this is the copy republished in 1894.

did.unittitle: Harper's Illustrated Pictorial History of the Civil War

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Published by Star Publishing Company, Chicago, Illinois; copyright 1894 Alfred H. Gernsey and Henry M. Alden, Chicago. Originally published in 1866, this is the copy republished in 1894.
